official_title: To grant a right of use and occupancy of a certain tract of land in Yosemite National Park to George R. Lange and Lucille F. Lange, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant named individuals a right of use and occupancy of a certain tract of land in Yosemite National Park, subject to specified conditions.

titles.title: To grant a right of use and occupancy of a certain tract of land in Yosemite National Park to George R. Lange and Lucille F. Lange, and for other purposes.
